summary: The key to the murder of a reclusive pornographer is an old 8mm snuff film.
cast: Peter Davison|Syan Blake|John Harding|Rob Spendlove|Billy Geraghty|Charles De'Ath|Emma Amos|Sean Hughes|Montanna Thompson|Jordan Murphy|Jeff Rawle|John Cater|Celia Imrie|Patrick Harper|Vera Graziadei|Vineeta Rishi|Jonathan Coy|Sian Thomas|Hywel Bennett|Natasha Barrero|Jamie Bamber|Etela Pardo|Aleksandar Mikic
title: Dangerous Liaisons
